name: Eternal Hero
description:
Description:

Evade, hack, and slash your way through five stages of boss battle bullet hell!

Put out the torches to disable the bosses' protective armor. Defeat the stage boss to unlock the door to the next stage.

Controls:

Move: Left/A, Right/D

Jump: Up/W

Enter Door: Down/S

Attack/Deflect Bullets: Space Bar

Credits:

https://unrealchan.itch.io/,  https://devjhin.itch.io/,

https://sjhkr2009.itch.io/, https://shaboomhan.itch.io/

Third Party Sprites:

aamatniekss, untiedgames, Kin Ng, Adwit Rahman, Moonir Tohami, Blackspire

Third Party Sounds:
